amendment.description: Amendment requires OMB to conduct a study on the effect of recovery audits conducted by executive agencies and to report the results of such study to Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require OMB to conduct a study on the effect of recovery audits conducted by executive agencies and to transmit the results of the study to Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
